pure interface of class zeta.form.TextForm.State

The documentated page. 
public static abstract class State
  extends FormState
{
    public abstract String getText(Session session);
    public abstract boolean setDraftText(Session session,
                                         String text);
    public void confirmText(Session session,
                            Locator locator,
                            Object source)
      throws zeta.session.Failures.FormFailed;
    public boolean hasHistory(Session session);
    public boolean stepHistory(Session session,
                               boolean advance);
    public void addToHistory(String string);
    public File getExternFile(Session session);
    public TextForm.State();
}
